quote: I find the best way to love someone is not to change them, but instead, help them reveal the greatest version of themselves. – Steve Maraboli
fact: In eighteenth-century English gambling dens, there was an employee whose only job was to swallow the dice if there was a police raid.
joke: There’s a new type of broom out, it’s sweeping the nation.
